text:
There currently is no way to configure a default error handler for catalina.

It would be a very nice enhancement to be able to configure a custom error
handler in the DefaultContext in server.xml so that all webapps in Tomcat or
a Host can use a custom error handler.
creator: glenn@apache.org

text:
You can now use the new errorReportValveClass of standard host to specify an 
alternate error report valve (whose only job is to output the error report).
Also, the error page dispatching should now work in nearly all situations, 
except if the whole context is unavailable.
creator: remm@apache.org
